title: Round Two

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You do not know you have this role. Instead, you spawn believing you are a random role that can fit within the role list. Until death, you keep all abilities, attributes, and win conditions of that role. Upon dying, this role is revealed to you.
- When you die with your original role, you will appear dead, and your original role will appear in the graveyard. If you are revived, you regain your original role until you die again.
- After you kill for the first time, all dead players become valid targets for abilities and hanging. They remain dead.
- When you are killed with this role, you die permanently. You cannot be revived by any means.
- **This role cannot spawn if there are any modifiers in play regarding death actions or disabling cause of death.**

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 2553
*Fate has given you a chance for redemption. Now go.*
